articles.title: Kim Jong Il Pays Unofficial Visit to China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Pays Unofficial Visit to China
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC), paid an unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China (PRC) from May 20 to 26 at the invitation of Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the PRC. 
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK; Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet; Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC; Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK; Mun Kyong Tok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK; Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK; Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador e. p. to China. 
					
					 Chinese party and state leaders warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il who visited China again for strengthening and developing the DPRK-China friendship sealed in blood and accorded him cordial hospitality with utmost sincerity. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il separately met and had talks with Hu Jintao, and Wen Jiabao, Jia Qinglin, Li Changchun, Xi Jinping, Li Keqiang, He Guoqiang and Zhou Yongkang, who are members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC. 
					
					 Upon his arrival at Beijing Kim Jong Il was greeted by Jia Qinglin, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC and chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference; Liu Qi, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., and secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPC; and leading officials of national organizations and Beijing Municipality.
					
					 He received a bunch of fragrant flowers from a child.
					
					 He had a conversation with Jia Qinglin.
					
					 Jia Qinglin warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il's visit to China on behalf of the CPC, the government of the PRC and the Chinese people upon the authorization of General Secretary Hu Jintao.
					
					 He noted that Hu Jintao and leading officials of the collective leadership were looking forward to the meeting with Kim Jong Il, attaching utmost importance to his China visit.
					
					 Kim Jong Il cordially met with Hu Jintao in Beijing on May 25 and held talks with him.
					
					 Present at the talks from the Chinese side were Xi Jinping, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC and vice-president of the PRC; Ling Jihua, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CPC and director of the General Office of the C.C., the CPC; Dai Bingguo, state councilor; Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC; Yang Jiechi, minister of Foreign Affairs; Zhang Ping, head of the National Development and Reform Committee; Chen Deming, minister of Commerce; Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC; and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador e. p. to the DPRK. 
					
					 Present there were Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet; Kim Yong Il, alternate member and secretary of the C.C., the WPK; and Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's visit to China is of particularly weighty importance in developing the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries on a higher stage, Hu Jintao noted, warmly welcoming his visit to China on behalf of the Chinese party, government and people.
					
					 He extended kind greetings to all the Korean people in their dynamic drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, in hearty response to the spirit of the historic conference of the WPK. 
					
					 Noting that the China visit paid by Kim Jong Il nine months after his two visits to China last year clearly proves what great importance he is attaching to the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries, Hu Jintao highly appreciated the devoted service rendered by Kim Jong Il for the steady development of the bilateral friendship. Hu Jintao stressed that Kim Jong Il's appraisal of the changes taking place in China, making a long trip to the Northeastern and Huadong regions of China, was boundless encouragement and full support to the struggle of the Chinese people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that he was pleased to meet Hu Jintao again and expressed deep thanks to him for having sent senior officials in the capital as far as the railway station on the border to warmly receive and accord him cordial hospitality during his visit. He extended warm congratulations to all the members of the CPC and people of China on the 90th anniversary of the party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave his impressions of the visit to the Northeastern and Huadong regions of China making steady progress full of dynamism. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that during his visit he could witness for himself the dynamic progress in the rapidly changing land of China through the achievements made in the economic and cultural fields and in the domain of the cutting-edge science and technology in its vast land. 
					
					 The top leaders of the two parties and countries informed each other of the situation in their countries and had an open-hearted exchange of views on boosting the relations between the two parties and countries and reached a full consensus of views in a comradely, sincere and friendly atmosphere.
					
					 They shared the view that it is the common sacred responsibility which no others can perform instead and steadfast stand to carry forward and develop down through generations the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations which have covered the 60 odd year-long proud and historic path and have been put on a new higher stage.
					
					 They recognized that according to the agreement the leaders of the two parties and countries reached after their meeting in Changchun last year the governments and peoples of the two countries have striven to put the issues into practice in various fields. 
					
					 It is favorable for more dynamically pushing forward socialist construction in the two countries, better protecting and promoting the common interests of the two sides and regional peace, stability and prosperity to boost the bilateral relations in various fields including high-level visits, brisk exchange of human culture and expansion of experience swap and mutually beneficial cooperation, they said, and discussed a series of measures to this end and reached an agreement.
					
					 It is the requirement of a new period and new situation to strengthen the unity between the two parties and countries and advance the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations with the era, Hu Jintao said, noting that the CPC and the PRC government will creditably discharge the historic responsibility for steadfastly carrying forward the baton of the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship associated with the noble soul of the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					  The Chinese side is set to inject fresh life and viability into the Sino-DPRK friendship and promote and put spurs to the development of the Sino-DPRK good neighborly relations of friendship and cooperation and boost them in wider dimension by pooling efforts with the DPRK side and thus bring greater wellbeing to the two countries and peoples and make a greater contribution to peace, stability and prosperity in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world, Hu Jintao noted.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship with a long history and tradition with the two countries linked by the same mountain and rivers is unbreakable as it stood all storms and tests and it will remain evergreen no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how frequently one generation is replaced by another, Kim Jong Il said, re-clarifying the invariable will and determination of the WPK  and the DPRK government to boost the friendly and cooperative relations in conformity with the noble intention of the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries and the desire of the two peoples. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed thanks to the party and government of China for having consistently set store by the DPRK-China friendship in the light of the strategic importance and from a prospective angle and having positively supported the Korean people in their struggle to defend socialism and achieve the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He reiterated the will to exert every possible effort for further consolidating the bonds of fraternal friendship enshrined in the minds of the two peoples and dynamically boosting the bilateral friendship, the common treasure of the two countries, in various fields.
					
					 Appreciating the new successes being made by the Chinese people in the efforts to accomplish the cause of building socialism with Chinese characteristics, he said that the Korean people are rejoiced as over their own success over the fact that everything is going well in China, their neighbor.
					
					 At the talks the two sides highly estimated the fact that the good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation between the two countries grew stronger after a series of historic meetings held between the top leaders of the DPRK and China in recent years and expressed mutual support and solidarity with the two parties and peoples in the struggle for socialist construction and national reunification.
					
					 Hu Jintao highly appreciated the positive measures taken by the DPRK to defend stability and peace, develop economy and improve the standard of people's living, wishing the Korean people greater success in socialist construction under the wise leadership of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He supported the Party, government and people of the DPRK firmly preserving socialism and exploring the road of development suited to its reality, expressing belief that the whole Party, the country and the people would achieve shining successes through a dynamic struggle, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed expectation that the Chinese people would win steady new victories in the historical course of furthering the building of the party's ability to govern, realizing scientific outlook on development and building a harmonious society under the guidance of the CPC with Hu Jintao as its general secretary, wishing them signal achievements this year, the first year of the 12th five-year plan.
					
					 Both sides had a sincere and in-depth exchange of views on international and regional issues of mutual concern, the situation in Northeast Asia, in particular.
					
					 Recognizing that the adherence to the goal of denuclearization on the whole Korean Peninsula, peaceful settlement of the issue through dialogue including the resumption of the six-party talks and the elimination of obstructive elements conform to the overall interests of Northeast Asia, the two sides shared views on making good understanding and coordination.
					
					 Hu Jintao hosted a banquet in welcome of Kim Jong Il's China visit at the Great Hall of the People on Wednesday evening.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Kye Gwan, Ji Jae Ryong and embassy officials.
					
					 Present there were senior Chinese party and state cadres including Li Changchun, Xi Jinping, He Guoqiang, Zhou Yongkang, Liu Qi, Guo Boxiong, Ling Jihua, Wang Huning, Dai Bingguo, Wang Jiarui, Yang Jiechi, Zhang Ping and Chen Deming and Liu Hongcai.
					
					 Speeches were made by Hu Jintao and Kim Jong Il at the banquet.
					
					 The banquet proceeded in amicable atmosphere full of comradely and friendly feelings.
					
					 An art performance specially prepared by Chinese artistes was given to welcome Kim Jong Il's visit to China.
					
					 The colorful performance given by famous national art groups and domestic and international concours winners included numbers such as Chinese songs "My Motherland", serial songs of "A Dream of Red Mansions", world famous music and Korean songs "Nostalgia" and "Blooming Worksite".
					
					  Kim Jong Il conveyed a floral basket in congratulation of the successful performance.
					
					 He exchanged warm farewell with the leading officials of the collective leadership of China including Hu Jintao and Xi Jinping.
					
					 Hoping to meet Kim Jong Il again, Hu Jintao wished him greater success in his important work for realizing the cause of building a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il met with Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao and had a cordial conversation with him at the state guest house on May 25.
					
					 Wen said he was very much pleased to see again Kim Jong Il in good health, adding that the current tour made by Kim Jong Il was the same as the one done by President Kim Il Sung 20 years ago.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that this visit was the seventh one in the new century, noting that the Chinese party, government and people showed him cordial hospitality every time he came.
					
					 He conveyed militant greetings of the C.C., the WPK and the NDC of the DPRK to the Chinese party, government and people.
					
					 On May 26 he visited the Shenzhou Digital Company on the outskirts of Beijing, accompanied by Li Keqiang.
					
					 After going round the company, he highly appreciated a lot of successes of the scientists and researchers in researches into cutting-edge science.
					
					 He said that both the DPRK and China need to learn from each other and exchange experience in many aspects and heartily wished the Chinese people fresh and greater achievements in the great work for building a comprehensively well-off society in the spirit of the 17th Congress of the CPC.
					
					 Li Keqiang gave a luncheon for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Jia Qinglin, Liu Qi and other senior officials of China were present at Beijing Railway Station to see off Kim Jong Il returning home. 
					
					 He successfully concluded his unofficial visit to the PRC and started on his way home in safety, receiving warm farewell from senior party and government officials of China including Dai Bingguo and Wang Jiarui who accompanied and guided him with sincerity in the whole period of the visit. 
					
					 His current visit to China for steady development of the DPRK-China friendship was successfully conducted under the special care and cordial hospitality of Hu Jintao and the party and government of China. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was satisfied at the results of the visit and expressed his heartfelt thanks for the cordial hospitality accorded to him by Chinese senior party and government officials.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for African Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for African Countries 
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, left here Thursday to pay an official goodwill visit to Nigeria and other African countries.
					 It was seen off at the airport by Pyon Yong Rip, secretary-general of the SPA Presidium, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned and Mordi Emmanuel, Nigerian charge d'affaires a.i. here, and Guan Huabing, Chinese charge d'affaires a.i.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Nigeria
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Nigeria
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun on Saturday sent a message of greetings to his Nigerian counterpart Henry Odein Ajumogobia on the 35th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the two countries. 
					 The two countries have closely cooperated in politics and economy since the establishment of diplomatic relations, the message said, expressing the stand to further strengthen the bilateral relations in conformity with the desire of the two peoples.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Ruling Crisis in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Ruling Crisis in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is now plunged into the worst ruling crisis. It suffered bitter defeat in the April 27 by-election and the people's wrath at the present conservative regime is on the brink of eruption.
					 Meanwhile, the "Grand National Party" has turned into a mourner's house, disrupted by dispute over the blame for the defeat in the by-election. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article observes in this regard:
					
					 The pitiful lot of the south Korean ruling quarters in serious crisis is due results of their unpopular rule.
					
					 This ruling crisis is ascribable to the south Korean authorities' sycophancy and treachery and their policy of dependence on outsiders, anti-reunification moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular politics. 
					
					 The traitorous policy of the conservative group deteriorated the people's livelihood so drastically, increasing the income disparity between the rich and the poor 29 times from 5.7 times 10 years ago.
					
					 This is the catastrophic reality brought by the present south Korean "government" which talked volubly that it would "reduce hardships of life" and "become a 'government' giving hope to the common people." 
					
					 The people's anger at the conservative authorities, which are enforcing the unpopular misrule while mocking at the people, has reached an extreme point. It is quite natural that such traitorous group has been driven to the bottomless pit of ruling. 
					
					 Now the south Korean conservative group is making desperate efforts to tide over the worsening ruling crisis and realize its ambition for retaking power, but such attempt will never be allowed by the people.
					
					 One's evil doings will rebound on oneself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Korean Faith in Victory of Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Korean Faith in Victory of Building Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- It is the immovable faith of the all the Korean people to defend and exalt their idea, system and cause to the last under the guidance of the party and the leader, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Thursday.
					 The Korean people regard it as their unshakable faith that a thriving nation is sure to be built under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the article says, adding:
					
					 He is now guiding to victory the general onward movement for building a thriving nation with his extraordinary leadership ability.
					
					 The Korean people visualize the rosy morrow of a thriving nation in the stirring reality in which prosperity of the country is being achieved thanks to his energetic leadership.
					
					 The tremendous strength of the DPRK displaying its might in political, military, economic and all other fields hardens the people's conviction in sure victory.
					
					 The Korean people are convinced that the mental power cemented on the road of Songun serves as the most important weapon for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea the revolutionary soldier spirit is now demonstrating its might as the ideological and moral weapon representing the people's mental power in every aspect.
					
					 There is no fortress impossible to conquer in the world when full play is given to the mental power. This is the unshakable faith of the Korean people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Enhanced Role of Progressive Information Urged
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Enhanced Role of Progressive Information Urged
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are now hell-bent on massively spreading the reactionary ideology and culture and misinformation by communication means in accordance with their demand and interests.
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a bylined article;
					
					 This reality urgently requires the developing countries to rapidly develop the field of information in order to enhance the role of the progressive information.
					
					 The non-aligned information should be a fair judge of history defending justice and attacking injustice.
					
					 The imperialists spread the bourgeois "view of value", culture and way of life over other countries with reliance on the outdated international information order and their superiority in the field of information technology. They also set afloat distorted information to foment social disorder and incite overthrow of system in the progressive countries.
					
					 They are intensifying the reactionary propaganda offensive by dint of modern information means in a bid to contain the countries aspiring after independence against imperialism and their rivals.
					
					 Through information activities non-aligned and other developing countries should widely introduce the just struggle of the peoples for sovereignty, independence and social progress and lift up the voices of international solidarity with it. They should also disclose and condemn all sorts of domination and interference, aggression and war moves that violate freedom and rights of human being and the sovereignty of countries and nations and threaten and wreck the peace of the world.
					
					 It is important to promote international exchange and cooperation in the field of information if those countries are to develop the information service and enhance its role.
					
					 To boost the exchange and cooperation in the information field is a sure guarantee for developing the information service of the developing countries and lifting up the world progressives' voice of justice.

articles.title: Pavement Project of Kowon-Hamhung Highway Finished
articles.content:
Pavement Project of Kowon-Hamhung Highway Finished
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The pavement project of the Kowon-Hamhung highway in South Hamgyong Province was finished recently. The highway began to be reconstructed on an expansion basis in mid-March.
					 Some 600,000 cubic meters of earth were cut or filled on the ground, over 250,000 cubic meters of sand and gravel tamped and nearly 700,000 square meters of road paved with concrete.
					
					 Trees have been planted and flowerbeds made on both sides of the highway. Slopes are being swarded and accident-preventing stones and waymarks installed.
					
					 Revetment, conduit and culvert projects will be completed soon.
					
					 The reconstructed highway will help facilitate transportation in the area and promote the country's economic growth.

articles.title: Pyongyang External Civil Law Firm
articles.content:
Pyongyang External Civil Law Firm
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Korea Lawyers' Association has an external civil law office.
					 The Pyongyang External Civil Law Firm acts legal representatives and provides legal service to local and foreign businesses.
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the firm, told KCNA that the firm renders assistance to corporations and individuals at home and abroad to protect their legal rights and interests and promote trade and economic and cultural exchange among nations.
					
					 "We give legal advices as regards economic transactions and foreign investment and offer assistance in working out or examining contract, lawsuit and arbitration documents," he said.
					
					 "We also act legal advisers and lawsuit and arbitration representatives at request of businesses and foreign investors," he added.
					
					 The firm is situated in Taedongmun-dong, Central District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: New Health Drink Developed
articles.content:
New Health Drink Developed 
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Experiment Analytical Institute of the State Academy of Sciences developed a new drink with Kumgang medical stone. 
					 The drink contains microelements and other mineral matters essential for human body. 
					
					 The mineral water enriches protein and fat and promotes nucleic acid metabolism and function of cells. 
					
					 It helps control osmotic pressure, promote movement of the tissue fluid, absorption and excretion and keeps acid-base equilibrium and pH in good state in human body.
					
					 It is also useful for the development of humors, bone, muscle and tooth and disinfection of water contaminated by microorganism.  
					
					 The drink has already proved effective in treatment of diseases.

articles.title: Mountain County Undergoes Radical Change
articles.content:
Mountain County Undergoes Radical Change
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Hochon County in South Hamgyong Province, the DPRK has taken on a new look.
					 Conspicuous in the central part of the township are a large mosaic of President Kim Il Sung with his face beaming with smile and a tower to his immortality.
					
					 The house of culture, health complex, hospital and library were reconstructed on a modern basis. The township also has shops, restaurants, nurseries, kindergartens and schools.
					
					 In recent years, the county newly built hundreds of dwelling houses, paved roads and covered footways with colorful flagstones.
					
					 Public buildings, industrial establishments and residential quarters have fences topped with Korean tiles.
					
					 The township has been supplied with purified water through a nature-driven waterway.
					
					 Dwelling houses use methane gas for cooking and heating.
					
					 Many trees of good species have been planted in mountains, new bridges built and roads reconstructed on an expansion basis.
					
					 Tiered power stations were constructed on Hwanggok stream to supply local factories and houses with electricity.
					
					 Soft drinks are made with wild fruits available in the mountain county.
					
					 Flocks of goats and sheep cover hills and valleys.

articles.title: Birthday of Chongryon Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of Chongryon Celebrated
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- May 25, Juche 44 (1955) is the significant day when the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) came to being.
					 The glorious course covered by Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, is associated with the wise guidance and benevolent love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 When the movement of Koreans in Japan was at the crossroads of survival and ruin, the President advanced the Juche-oriented policy of making line switchover and formed Chongryon, saying that the Koreans in Japan should work for their homeland and nation and carry on the Korean revolution although they live in Japan. This is the greatest exploit he performed in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has protected the socialist country and Chongryon, legacy of the President, with his invincible Songun leadership and is wisely steering the movement of Koreans in Japan in the new century.
					
					 From the outset of its formation, Chongryon has established the well-regulated organizational and work systems with the immortal Juche idea as the steadfast guideline. It has also realized the unity of ranks in thinking and purpose, thus turning into a dignified and authoritative organization of overseas Koreans. 
					
					 Though it is active in an alien land, Chongryon has organizations at all levels from the central body and branches and institutions of various fields, including education, culture, economy, science and technology and media to faithfully serve the compatriots as the homeland. 
					
					 It has also strengthened the work to defend the democratic national rights and education of compatriots, regarding it as the part of lifeline for the movement of Koreans in Japan, and thus given steady continuity to the patriotic movement. This is the shining success made by Chongryon.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have played a big role in the patriotic cause of prosperity of the homeland and national reunification.
					
					 Chongryon is now working hard to bring a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by carrying forward the exploits and tradition performed by their first generation in the patriotic drive.

articles.title: Probe into U.S. Forces' Crime Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into U.S. Forces' Crime Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet newspaper Jaju Minbo in an article on May 22 demanded that a probe be made into the defoliant-related crime of the U.S. troops, which has seriously threatened and taken lives of south Koreans. 
					 The situation is getting more serious as an investigation into the case of defoliant burial by the U.S. forces is intensified, the article said, adding:
					
					 Inhabitants, who worked in the U.S. Waegwan military base, testified to the fact that in 1973 the U.S. forces buried drums containing defoliant brought from Vietnam and disposed of radioactive waste in this base.
					
					 An old man, who worked as an interpreter for the U.S. 7th armored division during the last June 25 war, attested that he heard the story about the massive spread of defoliant from U.S. officers at that time.
					
					 The U.S. troops are habitual criminals. Therefore, it is necessary to thoroughly survey not only the Waegwan base but also all other U.S. military bases in south Korea with a fact-finding group selected by the people.
					
					 Perfect settlement of this case should be made to clearly show the U.S. troops what type of nation the Koreans are. If not, the U.S. troops will undoubtedly bury poisonous materials in their military bases on this land as much as they please.
					
					 That is why all the people should get ready to launch the second torchlight resistance for life-and-death struggle against the U.S. forces.

articles.title: Personage of Regional Body on Results of Election in S. Korea
articles.content:
Personage of Regional Body on Results of Election in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan, contributed an article titled "Fierce storm in south Korea" to the newspaper Al-Rai on May 14.
					 The article said that the opposition parties' landslide over the "Grand National Party" in the recent by-election in south Korea was a stern punishment meted out by the people to the GNP.
					
					 The GNP's defeat was due to the fact that it spoiled the atmosphere of reconciliation with the DPRK and enforced treacherous and unpopular "policies", violating democracy, it added. 
					
					 Publications of south Korea have described the results of the by-election as an eruption of the surging wrath of the people at the present "government" and the GNP that drew the people to the crisis of war, following outside forces, the article said.

articles.title: S. Koreans' Struggle for Independence Supported in Britain
articles.content:
S. Koreans' Struggle for Independence Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy made public a joint statement on May 19 to mark the 31st anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising. 
					 The uprising in May 1980 in south Korea was a heroic struggle against the U.S. and fascism, which gave great encouragement to the people of developing countries fighting against neocolonialism and dictatorial regime, the statement said. 
					
					 The blood shed by the uprisers will never be futile, it said, warning that the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime will come to collapse with eruption of the pent-up resentment of the south Korean people. 
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the south Korean people in the struggle to overthrow the Lee Myung Bak regime, drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and achieve independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: S. Korea: Visit to DPRK Disallowed
articles.content:
S. Korea: Visit to DPRK Disallowed
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification on May 20 rejected the application for visit to the DPRK by the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was to hold a meeting of its co-chairpersons in Kaesong on May 23 in order to discuss the orientation of its future action and the matter of conducting joint commemorations of the 11th anniversary of the joint declaration.
					
					 But the ministry barred the South Side Committee from attending the meeting under the pretext of "May 24 measure", thus bringing it to rupture.

articles.title: Crimes of Conservative Papers Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes of Conservative Papers Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- An Internet paper of south Korea on May 20 carried an article contributed by Yang Jong Chol, who was senior secretary for publicity and planning of Chongwadae during the preceding regime, to lay bare the crimes of conservative papers.
					 In the article he said that Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo, conservative papers, have recently extended their influence even to broadcasting service under the manipulation of the present regime, thus arousing unease and concern from public circles.
					
					 The papers left no means untried to ensure the conservative persons' winning in each "presidential election", disregarding impartiality of media, the article noted.
					
					 When persons backed by them were defeated, those papers made personal attack and slandered the elected "presidents", finally driving them to death, it charged.
					
					 Their crimes can be also found in insisting on sycophancy and humiliation in diplomacy and inciting confrontation between the north and the south while openly slandering the preceding chief executives' policy of dialogue, it said.
					
					 Uncountable are the crimes the conservative papers committed by aggravating discord among society, speaking only for the interests of big businesses and providing conditions favorable for the conservatives to come to power again, it added.

articles.title: End to Treacherous Rule Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Treacherous Rule Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea in a statement on May 23 called for turning out in the struggle to punish the treacherous regime.
					 After its emergence the present regime put pressure on the two former "presidents" to death, something unprecedented in the modern history of politics, the statement said.
					
					 It is the present ruling forces that have been engaged in corruption and irregularities while squandering money collected from the people as tax, suppressed the movement for democratization through dictatorship, tyranny and treacherous rule and brought a war crisis with the anachronistic policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, it said.
					
					 To punish this regime is the only way for realizing democracy in this land, ensuring the people's livelihood and achieving the peaceful reunification of the nation, it stressed.
					
					 The statement called upon the progressive forces to turn out in the valiant struggle to put an end to the treacherous rule by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: War Maneuvers Kicked Off by S. Korean Puppet Group
articles.content:
War Maneuvers Kicked Off by S. Korean Puppet Group
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet 36th infantry division staged an anti-terrorism drill at Wonju airport, south Korean Kangwon Province, on May 24, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The puppet group kicked off a war racket while vociferating about someone's "threat of terrorism" in coordination with the Hoengsong County Office, police station, etc.

articles.title: Record Proving Environment Pollution by U.S. Troops Discovered
articles.content:
Record Proving Environment Pollution by U.S. Troops Discovered
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A record proving the environmental pollution by the U.S. forces present in south Korea was discovered, according to south Korean MBC on May 23.
					 A study report made by the U.S. engineer corps in 1992 said that in those days the U.S. forces buried drums containing poisonous chemical materials in their base in Waegwan, Chilgok County, North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: Production of Electricity by Wind Increases in China
articles.content:
Production of Electricity by Wind Increases in China
 Beijing, May 24 (KCNA) -- Last year the amount of electricity production by wind reached 50.1 billion KW per hour in total, an increase of 81.41 percent over that in the preceding year.

articles.title: U.S. "Cuban Adjustment Act" Accused
articles.content:
U.S. "Cuban Adjustment Act" Accused
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Cuban ambassador to the United Nations rejected the U.S. "Cuban Adjustment Act", speaking at the UN General Assembly on May 19.
					 This act fosters the illegal escape to the U.S. from Cuba, he pointed out, saying that such law as the act is rare in the world.

articles.title: U.S., West Allies Source of Corruption
articles.content:
U.S., West Allies Source of Corruption
 Teheran, May 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies are the source of corruption in the world, Iranian Parliament (Majlis) Vice Speaker Mohammad-Hassan Aboutorabi-Fard said.
					 "The U.S. and Western mercenaries are the roots of corruption and today the West has turned into a symbol of corruption," Aboutorabi-Fard said at a meeting on fighting corruption attended by members of the Economic Cooperation Organization (ECO) on Saturday.
					
					 Aboutorabi-Fard reiterated that Tehran will exploit all its potentials to fight corruption and called on all ECO member states to cooperate to eradicate corruption.

articles.title: U.S. Aggressor Forces' Burial of Defoliant Branded as Hideous Crime
articles.content:
U.S. Aggressor Forces' Burial of Defoliant Branded as Hideous Crime  
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 972 on Thursday as regards the recently disclosed fact that the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea buried a huge amount of defoliant in U.S. forces bases in secrecy.
					 The information bulletin branded the above-said acts as the unpardonable criminal acts to savagely destroy the inviolable territory of Korea and turn the cradle of the Korean nation into a barren land in a bid to exterminate it.
					
					 The above-said case indicates it was an organized crime committed by the U.S., not just a crime perpetrated by a few individual officers or men of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea and this was not a crime which just happened in the past but it is an unprecedented crime against humanity which has been committed century after century, generation after generation, the information bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has regarded the land of south Korea as no more than a colonial dumping ground which it can trample down and where it can throw poisonous materials as it pleases and the south Korean people as no more than colonial slaves whom it never cares whether they are dead or alive.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are the herd of ferocious barbarians who leave no stone unturned to attain their purpose and neither the living of the south Koreans nor the existence of the Korean nation is thinkable as long as the U.S. imperialist occupation forces stay in south Korea.
					
					 It is the successive puppet rulers, the ancestors of the "Grand National Party", who protect and abet the horrible crimes of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea.
					
					  The Lee Myung Bak group is working hard to force the nation to fall victim to outside forces' policy of a war of aggression, while more shamelessly kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 The Korean people will never pardon the U.S. imperialists and the group of traitors for their criminal acts to besmirch the inviolable cradle for all Koreans and the generations to come and exterminate the nation.

articles.title: Natural Disasters Sweep Russia, Malaysia and U.S.
articles.content:
Natural Disasters Sweep Russia, Malaysia and U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- 477 cases of forest fire were reported in Russia on May 20.
					 The damaged area covers 97.5 hectares. A lot of forest fires were also reported in the Republic of Yakutiya, Sverdlovsk Region and Amur Region.
					
					 State of emergency was alerted in this country on May 21.
					
					 16 people died and 9 injured in a landslide due to the heavy rain in the vicinity Quala Lumpur, Malaysia, on May 21.
					
					 A massive storm system Sunday night dropped a devastating tornado into Joplin, a city of 50,000 people in the southwest corner of Missouri, United States, killing at least 116 people and leaving churches, schools, and homes reduced to ruins.

articles.title: Russia Stages Long-distance Patrol Flight
articles.content:
Russia Stages Long-distance Patrol Flight
 Moscow, May 24 (KCNA) -- Two "Ty-95MC" of the long-range flying corps of Russia's Air Force made a successful patrol flight, according to a spokesman for the Russian Defense Ministry on May 23.
					 These strategic bombers were air-refueled from tanker "Il-78" during their flight of more than 17 hours.
					
					 Their crewmen practiced aviation under the condition difficult to find bearings.

articles.title: Fidel Castro Accuses U.S. of Its Hegemonic Moves
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Accuses U.S. of Its Hegemonic Moves
 Havana, May 24 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro, leader of the Cuban revolution, in a recent article criticized the U.S. for its hegemonic moves.
					 The article said that the U.S. is now mocking and deceiving humankind as it wishes with the imperialist power and trying to impudently have other countries under its control whenever it thinks necessary.
					
					 The U.S. believes that it can groom the world to be always gentle, but this is a very foolish dream, the article said.

articles.title: Iran Arrests 30 Suspected of U.S-linked Spying
articles.content:
Iran Arrests 30 Suspected of U.S-linked Spying
 Teheran, May 24 (KCNA) -- Recently a spy ring linked to the United States Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) was uncovered in Iran.
					 The Iranian Intelligence Ministry said in a statement Saturday it had arrested 30 people of a spy ring linked to the United States CIA.
					
					 The statement said that the U.S.-related spy network was operating under the cover of the so called job-finding centers to attract Iranian citizens to cooperate with them, by promising them jobs and education opportunities, and deceiving them with visa and entry permission to the United States.

articles.title: PNA Accuses Israel of Punishing Prisoners
articles.content:
PNA Accuses Israel of Punishing Prisoners
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian National Authority (PNA) on Sunday accused Israel of escalating measures of "collective punishment" against prisoners.
					 The PNA's Ministry of Prisoners' Affairs said in a statement that Israeli prison authorities increased search raids in the detainees' cells and rooms, adding that the search "is accompanied by attacks, humiliation and individual and collective punishment."
					
					 The statement said the increasing search operations in the cells "aim at creating instability among the prisoners and destroy their rights."
					
					 The statement demanded the Israeli authorities stop violence on the prisoners immediately and free them as soon as possible.

articles.title: Accidents Kill People in Vietnam and Serbia
articles.content:
Accidents Kill People in Vietnam and Serbia
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Fifteen people including five children, six women and four foreign tourists were dead in southern Vietnam after a double-decker tour boat sunk on Friday night.
					 Seven people were injured, one seriously, in two separate incidents where propane cylinders exploded in a bakery and a nearby butcher shop in the central Serbian town of Krusevac on May 19.

articles.title: Quakes and Volcano Hit Different Countries
articles.content:
Quakes and Volcano Hit Different Countries
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A 6.1-magnitude earthquake jolted waters off northeastern area of Kermadec Islands, New Zealand, on May 22.
					 The epicenter was 942 km northeast from Auckland City.
					
					 On the same day a 5.2-magnitude quake hit Taiwan. Its epicenter was around Hualian County.
					
					 Meanwhile, a powerful eruption has started in Iceland's most active volcano Grimsvotn on May 21.
					
					 The sky in the area around the volcano was set as a no-fly zone.

articles.title: African Countries Cooperate in Struggle to Prevent Terrorism
articles.content:
African Countries Cooperate in Struggle to Prevent Terrorism
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Countries in the Sahel-Sahara region are strengthening cooperation in fighting terrorism and drug trafficking.
					 Mali, Mauritania, Niger and Algeria on Friday will set up a joint force of 85 000 to patrol their shared Sahel-Sahara desert zone.
					
					 The force will be deployed in 18 months to carry out the duty to detect and wipe out terrorists and drug traffickers.

articles.title: Two U.S. Soldiers Killed in Iraq
articles.content:
Two U.S. Soldiers Killed in Iraq
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- U.S. soldiers in Iraq have been killed due to the military operations of resistance forces of the country.
					 Two U.S. soldiers were killed on Sunday during operations in central Iraq.

articles.title: Chinese Government's Management of Internet Is Sovereign Act
articles.content:
Chinese Government's Management of Internet Is Sovereign Act
 Beijing, May 24 (KCNA) -- China on Thursday dismissed a lawsuit launched by several New York residents against a leading Internet search engine and the Chinese government, saying the country's management of the Internet is a sovereign act.
					 "The Chinese government's legal management of the Internet is in line with international practice and is a sovereign act. According to international laws, foreign courts have no jurisdiction," Foreign Ministry spokesperson Jiang Yu said.
					
					 According to media reports, the New York residents filed the suit claiming that some information they released online was screened by Baidu, China's largest search engine, and the Chinese government.
					
					 "The Chinese government encourages and supports the development of the Internet and ensures citizens' freedom of speech in accordance with the law," Jiang told a regular news briefing.

articles.title: Hamas: Reconciliation Boosts Armed Struggle against Israel
articles.content:
Hamas: Reconciliation Boosts Armed Struggle against Israel
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A Hamas official said Sunday that the reconciliation deal between Hamas and Fatah boosts armed struggle against Israel.
					 "Resistance is the only one capable of ending the (Israeli) occupation," the official said.

articles.title: Europe Should Share Progress with L. America: UN Official
articles.content:
Europe Should Share Progress with L. America: UN Official
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Europe needs to share socio-economic progress with Latin America, the head of the UN Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean said.
					 Addressing the recent Euro-Latin American Parliamentarian Assembly, the official said that there was no reason to think that the progress of one region would be at the expense of the other.
					
					 The European Union must open the doors more extensively to exports from Latin America, she said.

articles.title: Consultative Meeting of Nigerian Preparatory Committee Held
articles.content:
Consultative Meeting of Nigerian Preparatory Committee Held
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A consultative meeting of the Nigerian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was held in Abuja on May 19.
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, co-chairman of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and chairman of the Nigerian preparatory committee, referred to the fact that actions are being briskly conducted on a worldwide scale to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of the President. He stressed the need for Nigeria to join in this work.
					
					 The meeting adopted an action program of the committee for holding such events as remembrance meeting, round-table talks, seminar, photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun in 2012.

articles.title: Day of Sun in 2012 to Be Commemorated in Russia and Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Sun in 2012 to Be Commemorated in Russia and Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the Russian Philosophy Association sent a letter to the DPRK embassy in Moscow on May 19 in support of the decision of the senior officials' meeting of the International Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the appeal to the Juche idea followers of the world adopted at the Latin American regional seminar on the Juche idea.
					 All the members of the group holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the great leader in the era of independence will make joint efforts to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun in 2012, the letter said. 
					
					 It briefed on the fact that colorful political and cultural events are being briskly organized to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun in 2012 under the sponsorship of the Preparatory Committee of Far Eastern Region of Russia for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the work to publish the newspaper The Banner of Mt. Paektu is making headway.
					
					 The Bangladesh National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung, too, issued a statement on May 20, in which it expressed the will to fully discharge its mission and responsibility in the work to commemorate the Day of the Sun in 2012 with splendor in close touch with organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il realiza visita extraoficial a la RPCh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il realiza visita extraoficial a la RPCh
 Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo del dia 20 al 26 una visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China cumplimentando la invitacion de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la RPCh.
					 Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta visita Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kye Gwan, primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y Ji Jae Ryong, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano acreditado en China.
					
					 Los lideres del partido y el Estado de China dieron calida bienvenida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien volvio a visitar a China para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la amistad Corea-China establecida con sangre, y le trataron con maxima hospitalidad y sinceridad.
					
					 El Dirigente se reunio y converso por separado con Hu Jintao y los miembros del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh: Wen Jiabao, Jia Qinglin, Li Changchun, Xi Jinping, Li Keqiang, He Guoqiang y Zhou Yongkang.
					
					 A su arribo a Beijing, el fue acogido por Jia Qinglin, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y presidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino, Liu Qi, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y secretario del Comite del PCCh en la Ciudad de Beijing, y otros cuadros directivos del centro y de la ciudad de Beijing.
					
					 Le obsequio un ramo de flores fragantes una nina china.
					
					 El Dirigente sostuvo conversaciones con Jia Qinglin.
					
					 Por encargo del Secretario General Hu Jintao, Jia Qinglin dio calida bienvenida al Dirigente en nombre del PCCh, el gobierno de la RPCh y el pueblo chino.
					
					 Prosiguio que el Secretario General Hu Jintao y otros cuadros de la direccion central esperan el encuentro con el Secretario General Kim Jong Il concediendo mucha importancia a su visita a China.
					
					 Kim Jong Il y Hu Jintao se reunieron y conversaron el dia 25 en Beijing en un clima cordial.
					
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte china Xi Jinping, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y vicepresidente de la RPCh, Ling Jihua, miembro del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina General del CC del PCCh, Dai Bingguo, consejero de Estado, Wang Jiarui, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Yang Jiechi, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Zhang Ping, jefe del Comite de Desarrollo Nacional y Reforma, Chen Deming, ministro de Comercio, Liu Jieyi, subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, y Liu Hongcai, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario chino en Corea. 
					
					 Se distinguian por la parte coreana Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, y Kim Kye Gwan, primer viceministro de RR.EE.
					
					 Hu Jintao felicito calurosamente la visita a la RPCh del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en representacion del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China, destacando que esta visita tiene una importancia especial para desarrollar en una etapa mas alta las tradiciones relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
					
					 Envio un saludo atento a todo el pueblo coreano que lucha energicamente por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012, ano del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, en pleno acato al espiritu de la historica Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					 Senalando que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il volvio a visitar a China a los 9 meses desde sus dos visitas del ano pasado, Hu Jintao dijo que eso es una prueba elocuente de que aquel concede gran importancia a la tradicional amistad China-Corea, forjada por los lideres de generacion veterana de ambos paises.
					
					 Y evaluo altamente el gran aporte del Secretario General Kim Jong Il al desarrollo constante de la amistad China-Corea.
					
					 En su larga travesia por las regiones del Nordeste y Huadong de China, el camarada Kim Jong Il evaluo los cambios que acontecen en el territorio chino, dijo y agrego que esto constituye un estimulo ilimitado y apoyo activo a la lucha del pueblo chino.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il expreso su satisfaccion por el reencuentro con el Secretario General Hu Jintao y le agradecio profundamente por haber enviado a los cuadros directivos del centro a la estacion ferroviaria fronteriza para la recepcion amable y dispensado gran hospitalidad durante su estancia en China.
					
					 Ademas, mando calidas felicitaciones a todos los militantes del PCCh y el pueblo chino que acogeran el 90o aniversario de la fundacion de esa organizacion.
					
					 Seguidamente, hablo de la impresion que tuvo de su recorrido por las regiones del Nordeste y Huadong de China que avanzan adelante llenas de vitalidad. 
					
					 Dijo que durante su visita, pudo ver directamente la realidad de desarrollo de las tierras chinas en el curso de transformacion vertiginosa, a traves de los exitos que se logran en el extenso continente chino en los planos como la economia, la cultura y la ciencia y tecnologia de punta. 
					
					 Los maximos dirigentes de los dos partidos y dos paises se informaron en un ambiente camaraderil, sincero y amistoso la situacion de sus respectivos paises, intercambiaron francamente las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones entre los dos partidos y dos paises y llegaron al consenso completo.
					
					 Coincidieron en que continuar y consolidar generacion tras generacion las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-China, que recorrieron con orgullos una trayectoria historica de mas de 60 anos y entraron en una nueva etapa elevada, constituyen la sagrada e insustituible responsabilidad comun y la invariable posicion de ambas partes. 
					
					 Reconocieron que despues del encuentro en Changchun en el ano pasado, los gobiernos y los pueblos de ambos paises se han esforzado en todos los dominios por implementar los puntos del acuerdo alcanzado en esa ocasion por los dirigentes de los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					 Desarrollar las relaciones Corea-China en varias esferas, tales como las visitas de alto nivel, el intercambio de civilizacion y experiencias, la ampliacion de la cooperacion de beneficio mutuo, favorece el impulso activo de la construccion socialista en los dos paises, la defensa y la promocion de los intereses comunes de ambas partes, la paz, la estabilidad y la prosperidad de la region, senalaron y discutieron una serie de las medidas para el respecto llegando al consenso.
					
					 Hu Jintao dijo que la nueva epoca y la nueva situacion exigen fortalecer la solidaridad entre los dos partidos y dos paises y llevar adelante con el paso del tiempo las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea.
					
					 Agrego que el PCCh y el gobierno de la RPCh cumpliran con toda su responsabilidad historica en dar firme continuidad a la tradicional amistad China-Corea en que esta impregnado el noble espiritu de los revolucionarios de veterana generacion de ambos paises. 
					
					 La parte china quiere esforzarse junto con la parte coreana por dar nueva vitalidad y vigor a la amistad China-Corea, promover y desarrollar mas ampliamente las relaciones de amistad y buena vecindad entre los dos paises con el fin de asegurar a ambos paises y pueblos el mayor bienestar y hacer mayor aporte a la paz, la estabilidad y la prosperidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo, enfatizo. 
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il destaco que la amistad de larga historia y tradicion entre Corea y China, paises colindados con montanas y rios en el medio, es la inquebrantable, que supero todos los vientos y mareas y las pruebas, y sera invariable aunque pase mucho tiempo y se sucedan muchas generaciones.
					
					 Ratifico la inconmovible voluntad y decision del PTC y del gobierno de la RPDC de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises conforme al noble proposito de los lideres de generacion veterana y a la aspiracion de los pueblos de ambos paises. 
					
					 Expreso agradecimiento por el hecho de que el partido y el gobierno de China conceden siempre mucha importancia a la amistad Corea-China desde el elevado punto de vista estrategico y con perspectivas y apoyan activamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por la prosperidad del pais. 
					
					 Apunto que se esforzara en todo lo posible por consolidar los lazos de hermandad que echaron sus raices en el alma de los pueblos de los dos paises, de modo que la amistad Corea-China, patrimonio comun, adquiera mayor vitalidad en todos los dominios. 
					
					 Al evaluar los nuevos exitos del pueblo chino en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas, asevero que el pueblo coreano esta alegre de que le marchara bien lo todo a su vecino (China) considerando como propios sus exitos. 
					
					 Durante las conversaciones, quedaron apreciados altamente el fomento y el desarrollo de las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion despues de las historicas cumbres Corea-China celebradas en varias ocasiones en los ultimos anos, y se manifestaron el apoyo mutuo y la solidaridad con la lucha de los dos partidos y dos pueblos por la construccion socialista y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 Hu Jintao evaluo altamente las medidas activas de Corea por preservar la estabilidad y la paz, desarrollar la economia y mejorar las condiciones de la vida del pueblo y deseo al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en la construccion socialista bajo la sabia guia del PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Expreso el apoyo a que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea defienden con firmeza el socialismo y buscan la via de desarrollo conveniente a las realidades propias del pais y manifesto la conviccion de que todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo, unidos monoliticamente en torno al camarada   Kim Jong Il, alcanzaran exitos brillantes a traves de su energica lucha. 
					
					 El Dirigente expuso la esperanza de que bajo la direccion del PCCh encabezado por el Secretario General Hu Jintao, el pueblo chino alcanzara constantes y nuevas victorias en la trayectoria historica para fortalecer la capacidad gobernante del partido, poner en practica la concepcion cientifica de desarrollo y construir una sociedad armoniosa y deseo que China logre exitos orgullosos en este ano, primer ano del cumplimiento del 12o plan quinquenal.
					
					 Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sinceras y profundas sobre los problemas internacionales y regionales de interes comun, en particular, sobre la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					 Reconocieron que mantener la meta de desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana, perseguir la solucion pacifica mediante los dialogos, incluso la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, y eliminar los obstaculos convienen a los intereses generales de la region del Nordeste Asiatico y acordaron intensificar el intercambio de opiniones y la coordinacion para ese fin. 
					
					 Hu Jintao ofrecio el dia 25 por la noche en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo un banquete opiparo para expresar bienvenida al Dirigente.
					
					 Fueron invitados Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Kye Gwan, Ji Jae Ryong y los miembros de la embajada coreana en China. 
					
					 Estuvieron presentes Li Changchun, Xi Jinping, He Guoqiang, Zhou Yongkang, Liu Qi, Guo Boxiong, Ling Jihua, Wang Huning, Dai Bingguo, Wang Jiarui, Yang Jiechi, Zhang Ping, Chen Deming y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado de China, y el embajador chino en Corea Liu Hongcai. 
					
					 En la recepcion pronunciaron discursos el camarada Hu Jintao y el camarada Kim Jong Il.
					
					 El banquete transcurrio en un ambiente camaraderil, amistoso y cordial.
					
					 Los artistas chinos ofrecieron una funcion preparada especialmente para dar bienvenida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 En la escena actuaron las prestigiosas entidades artisticas centrales y los ganadores de concursos nacionales e internacionales y se presentaron la cancion "Mi patria", la serial de "El sueno en la camara roja" y otras canciones chinas, las famosas del mundo y las coreanas "Nostalgia" y "Centro de trabajo en esplendor", entre otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					 El Dirigente envio un cesto de flores para felicitar a los ejecutantes por la exitosa funcion.
					
					 El Dirigente intercambio cordiales saludos de despedida con Hu Jintao, Xi Jinping y otros cuadros de la direccion central de China.
					
					 Hu Jintao expreso su esperanza de volver a reunirse con el Dirigente, deseandole mayores exitos en su importante trabajo por el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					 El Dirigente converso cordialmente el dia 25 con el premier del Consejo de Estado de China Wen Jiabao quien le hizo una visita a su hospederia.
					
					 Wen Jiabao dijo sentirse alegre por el reencuentro con el Dirigente muy saludable y prosiguio que la ruta de la presente visita del Secretario General Kim Jong Il es igual al trayecto de la visita realizada hace 20 anos por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 El Dirigente dijo que esta es su septima visita a China en el nuevo siglo y agrego que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China le trataron con suma amabilidad y sinceridad en cada visita.
					
					 Por conducto de Wen Jiabao, el Dirigente transmitio en nombre del CC del PTC y el CDN de la RPDC un saludo combativo al partido, al gobierno y al pueblo de China.
					
					 El dia 26, el Dirigente visito en compania de Li Keqiang a la Compania Digital Shenzhou en las afueras de Beijing.
					
					 Tras recorrer la compania, el Dirigente aprecio altamente muchos exitos alcanzados por los cientificos e investigadores en las ciencias sofisticadas.
					
					 Apunto que ambas partes deben aprender una de la otra e intercambiar las experiencias en muchos planos y formulo sinceros votos por hacer que el pueblo chino logre nuevos y mayores exitos en el cumplimento de su causa para construir en todos los sentidos una sociedad elementalmente acomodada segun el espiritu del 17o Congreso del Partido Comunista de China.
					
					 Li Keqiang ofrecio un almuerzo en honor del Dirigente.
					
					 El Dirigente fue despedido en la estacion ferroviaria de Beijing por Jia Qinglin, Liu Qi y otros cuadros directivos chinos.
					
					 El Dirigente termino exitosamente su visita extraoficial a China y emprendio el camino de vuelta a la patria recibiendo el saludo cordial de despedida de Dai Bingguo, Wang Jiarui y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de China quienes le guiaron con toda sinceridad acompanandolo en todo el trayecto de la visita. 
					
					 La visita extraoficial del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a la Republica Popular China en aras del fortalecimiento y el desarrollo continuos de la amistad Corea-China concluyo con exito bajo la atencion especial y por el agasajo del camarada Hu Jintao, el partido y el gobierno de China.
					
					 El Dirigente expreso su satisfaccion por el resultado de la visita y agradecio sinceramente la gran hospitalidad con que le trataron los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de China.

articles.title: CRPP fustiga enterramiento de defoliante por tropas norteamericanas
articles.content:
CRPP fustiga enterramiento de defoliante por tropas norteamericanas
 Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Se conocio hace poco que las tropas agresoras norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea enterraron en secreto en el recinto de su base mucha cantidad de defoliante, sustancia quimica altamente toxica.
					 Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico este jueves la informacion no. 972 cuyo texto resumido sigue:
					
					 El enterramiento de defoliante constituye otro imperdonable crimen de mayor envergadura que se ha cometido para devastar el sagrado territorio patrio y exterminar a la nacion coreana contaminando sus tierras de sustento hasta que fueran inhabitables.
					
					 El autor de ese incidente no es unos oficiales o soldados individuales de las tropas norteamericanas, sino se trata de un crimen organizado y de lesa humanidad de EE.UU. que se comete hasta ahora de decada en decada.
					
					 Para este imperio, el suelo surcoreano no es mas que el basurero colonial en que puede hacer todo lo que quisiera, inclusive botar las sustancias toxicas, y sus pobladores son esclavos coloniales cuyas vidas no le importan ni un comino.
					
					 La realidad demuestra claramente que las tropas yanquis son la horda de bestias que no repara en nada para alcanzar sus objetivos y que si se les deja seguir ocupando el suelo surcoreano, no se puede pensar en la vida del pueblo surcoreano ni en la existencia de la nacion coreana.
					
					 Los sucesivos gobernantes titeres del Sur de Corea, que son antecesores del "Gran Partido Nacional", habian amparado y hasta promovido los actos criminales de los uniformados yanquis.
					
					 Hoy en dia, la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak se muestra mas docil y aduladora a EE.UU. y se mueve desesperadamente para sacrificar a la nacion coreana en el cumplimiento de la politica de guerra agresiva de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					 No perdonaremos jamas los crimenes de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos que pretenden exterminar a toda la nacion coreana contaminando el sagrado territorio nacional donde tendran que vivir juntos para siempre todos los compatriotas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta la crisis de gobernacion en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta la crisis de gobernacion en el Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Ahora la banda de conservadores surcoreanos se encuentra en la peor crisis de dominacion. Sufrio una gran derrota en las elecciones suplementarias del 27 de abril mientras  llega a la fase de explosion la indignacion de la poblacion surcoreana por el actual "poder" conservador. 
					 Entre tanto, en el seno del "Gran Partido Nacional" se arma una trifulca para imputar la responsabilidad por el descalabro electoral. 
					
					 Esta situacion miserable es producto inevitable de las politicas antipopulares de los actuales gobernantes surcoreanos, opina el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este jueves y continua:
					
					 La causa principal de la crisis de dominacion, que sufren las autoridades surcoreanas, esta en su politica vendepatria, antipopular y servil a grandes potencias y en sus campanas de confrontacion fratricida de caracter anti-reunificacion.
					
					 En lo contrario a las promesas de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos de que "aliviaria las penas de la vida del pueblo" y "seria el gobierno que infunda esperanza en la poblacion humilde", quedo depauperada a mas no poder la vida de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					 Por ejemplo, los ingresos de los ricos superan ahora 29 veces los de los extremadamente pobres frente a 5.7 veces de hace una decada. 
					
					  Es natural que llegara al climax la indignacion de la poblacion surcoreana por las actuales autoridades conservadoras que practican las politicas antipopulares enganando al pueblo. 
					
					  Ahora, ellas se mueven desesperadamente para retomar el poder al remediar la crisis de dominacion en curso de agravacion. 
					
					 Pero, el pueblo surcoreano no lo permitira nunca.
					
					 El criminal sera enjuiciado tarde o temprano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a consolidar el papel de medios de prensa progresista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a consolidar el papel de medios de prensa progresista
 Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este jueves un articulo individual revelando que hoy dia, los imperialistas utilizan los medios informativos para difundir a su conveniencia la ideologia y cultura reaccionarias y las desinformaciones. 
					 La realidad de hoy urge a los paises en vias de desarrollo desarrollar rapido el sector de informacion para elevar el papel de los medios de prensa progresistas. 
					
					 La informacion de los Paises No Alineados debe ser el juez imparcial de la historia que defienda la justicia condenando la injusticia. 
					
					 Los imperialistas divulgan a otros paises la "concepcion de valor", la cultura y el modo de vida burgueses y las desinformaciones abusando del viejo orden internacional de informacion y aprovechando su superioridad tecnica en la rama. De esta manera, desestabilizan los paises progresistas e instigan abiertamente el derrocamiento de sus regimenes. 
					
					 Los blancos principales de la campana mediatica de los imperialistas son sus rivales y los paises independientes y antiimperialistas. 
					
					 A traves de las actividades informativas, los paises no alineados y los en vias de desarrollo deben dar a conocer ampliamente la lucha justa de los pueblos por la independencia, la libertad y el progreso social y alzar las voces de solidaridad internacional.
					
					 Igualmente, tienen que revelar y denunciar la dominacion, la intervencion, las agresiones y las guerras de toda indole que violan la libertad y los derechos del ser humano y la soberania del pais y la nacion, amenazan y perturban la paz mundial.
					
					 Para este fin, deben desarrollar el intercambio y la cooperacion internacional en el sector de informacion.
